issue.title: [JS] Schema custom_metadata is not exposed
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1985](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1985). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We extract the Schema's `custom_metadata` from the flatbuffers and put it into a `Schema` object (https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/js/src/format/fb.ts#L80), but that object isn't kept around.
